title: Just in the nick of time: a new MoxieTV Episode
body:
Here's a new episode of MoxieTV for you to lambast. It's the shortest one to date, but there's only so much you can do with a bunch of rubber snakes.

And now for something completely different: an animated gif of Chuck Norris popping some blonde in the nose. It's only funny because it's Chuck. *sigh* If only we could get him to do a MoxieTV episode with us... if only.
author: Dan

comments.author: Caleb
comments.body: The snakes have to do with this, the instant cult classic movie that hasn't even hit theaters yet (it will in August). It has the biggest hype surrounding it of any movie since...well, nothing really. The Blair Witch Project had close to the same hype I guess. Anyway, it looks like the crappiest movie of the year, but that's why it looks so good. Oh yeah, and Samuel L. Jackson is in it.

comments.author: Nate
comments.body:
It started as a few internet jokes that snowballed into a big, self-aware, self-referencing thing, where its cool if people make obscure references to it that other people pick up on. Similar to All Your Base Belong To Us or Chuck Norris jokes.
You know it's reached critical mass when it found its way into MoxieTV. Next it will be on the cover of Time.

comments.body: Originally this episode was supposed to include a picture of Samuel L. Jackson holding a snake with The Moxie behind him... and you'd hear him say, "I'm sick of all these snakes!" That portion was lost in the editing, however.
